mean_cn: n. 不请自来的推销电话
mean_en: cold calling is the marketing process of approaching prospective customers or clients—typically via telephone, by email or through making a connection on a social network—who were not expecting such an interaction
sentence: Cold calling is so annoying; they keep trying to sell me useless stuff.
sentence_trans: 推销电话十分讨人厌，他们不停的想要我买一些没用的东西。
